brewery.name: Backwoods Brewing Company
brewery.description: Backwoods Brewing was founded in 2012 and is located in Carson, WA, just an hour from Portland, OR. It is family owned and operated, with the goal to provide great beer and jobs to our small local community. The brewery has grown in size, starting from a single barrel brew pub, to now a 20 barrel system, with an estimated output of 6000 barrels in 2015. Backwoods specializes in NW style ales, sourcing as many local ingredients as possible. The beer can be found in draft at local bars and restaurants, as well in package format at many local grocery chains and independent stores.
